flawed_nl_solution:
If 10 sales professionals each sell 10 cars per month, then they sell a combined 10*10=<<10*10=10>>10 cars per month.
If the store has 500 cars, then it will take the sales team 500/10=<<500/10=50.0>>50.0 months to sell all of the cars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 10. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
